website_summaries.verdict: This economical and reliable mixer comes with a case for your attachments that snaps to the bottom for storage.
pros: Includes two beaters and a whisk attachment
Good level of power for a hand mixer at this price point
The snap on compartment works well and helps keep your attachments from getting lost
Storage area saves space in the drawers
cons: This mixer does not have a lot of differentiation between the speeds
The low speed tends to not be very slow

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: NOT AS SEEN on picture. Please remove the picture that has kneading attachment. The only reason I purchased this higher-priced hand mixer was because the attachment came in the pictures. Very disappointed!!! Wasted time+money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Olya P.

customer_reviews.title: IT TRULY DOES HAVE A SLOW SPEED!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a mixer that actually does have a slow (or at least slower) speed that doesn't throw everything out of the bowl. This is my 3rd try, with the other two having had 3 speeds; fast, faster, and fastest, so I can really enjoy this one. While not quite as slow as I would have liked, it is still within reason, so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ozark Boy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT mixer - awesome price!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a replacement for a 'high end' mixer that had fantastic reviews. That mixer (at double the price) cannot hold a candle to THIS one. The high end mixer was highly rated (my fiance researched/purchased for me) even though it was only a 3-speed. Well....I used it 3 times, returned it and PURCHASED THIS ONE to replace it !!! Power is great and I like the beater storage feature. Highly recommended....
customer_reviews.author: Ms. King

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 5 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: STOP WORKING AFTER exactly 5 months. Trying to get a replacement or contact the company I bought it from .
customer_reviews.author: Mary M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this product it is a piece ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hand held mixer for the freedom to quickly mix and blend cakes and icing. However, this mixer did nothing of the sort. The blades are advertised as quick to insert which they were and even quicker to fall out. Do not waste your money on this product it is a piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: yoda

customer_reviews.title: Not lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but it is very heavy for me. My arm hurts by the time I am finished. But I am an older lady, so maybe the younger folks would be okay with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Is pretty good, no eject button
customer_reviews.text: Can whip up egg white in a few minutes. Low speed isn't that low either, still practice caution when mixing things that have not been broken up yet. No eject button for ejecting the whisks, need to pull off the whisk from the front. Might be a bit inconvenient when there are stuff on the whisk as you will dirty your hands. It is possible to pull off the whisk by just holding the shaft part though. Edit: as commented below by Jamesbo, you can eject the whisks by pushing down the speed control. I didn't notice the marking beside the numbers, so that's what it means!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lee

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have a electric pro made by a Nother company that I purchased 30 years ago 1987 , and still works ! But since it’s been so long I thought I would get a back up just in case it breaks ( old one ),but it lasted forever and still going strong. So I wanted to try this one a few times to make sure it works properly , no problems whatsoever , I love the whisk.
customer_reviews.author: SHARKY

customer_reviews.title: Good mixer but still too fast
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Large sturdy beaters instead of thin wires Roomy case Powerful motor Easy hand action to select speeds-no special effort required to eject beaters either Cons: The low speed is still WAY to fast. I cannot imagine ever using any of the higher speeds. The splattering requires working in a deep bowl with a partial cover. Hamilton Beach probably lowered it as they say they did but keep looking if you want slower speeds. It may not be possible at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: C McNulty

customer_reviews.title: The beaters rusted quickly
customer_reviews.text: The beaters rusted after only a few months. I don't use it often so it wasn't washed often. There is a lot of power and I didn't find that it was particularly hard to insert or get out the beaters. However, because of the rusting beaters, I would not suggest buying this one. mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Sue - SC

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Trying to attach the mixer blades is difficult at best. And then once you think you have them in? Don't rely on them staying in. Although the idea of having a base to store the cord and mixer blades is a good one - trying to use it - not so much. I just threw mine in the garbage where it belongs. I really wish the star rating had the ability to enter NO stars, but it doesn't work that way, so I was forced to give it ONE star.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Low quality underpowered
customer_reviews.text: I had my last hand mixer of similar size and price point for almost 20 years. I have maybe used this hand mixer a dozen times since ordering it in July. I am left wondering if I got a defective mixer or if this is truly the lowest quality piece of junk ever made. It often smells like electrical burning when I mix cookie dough. The beaters are particularly challenging to get in properly and it’s underpoweted for even the most basic of tasks. I am usually a fan of Hamilton Beach products but this is a huge letdown
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Nugent King

customer_reviews.title: Great hand mixer.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, more than powerful enough for everything. Have been using it for 6 months now and it works great. I was worried about how the mixer blades push into the mixer but they are more than durable enough just different than my old one. I like the plastic cover that the mixer snaps into keeps everything together.
customer_reviews.author: MAL8585

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mixer stopped working on first use. I was making a cake for daughters B'day. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Luv12

customer_reviews.title: Missing attachments!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly but NONE of the attachments that were supposed to be included were in the box!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rusting after 2 uses!!
customer_reviews.text: updating my review ... the beaters are already rusting on this mixer and I’ve only used it two times!!! I always hand wash and still this product didn’t hold up! Very disappointed ... love the storage ideas but what use is that if the beaters won’t hold up! I’m beyond my return window so I’m stuck with this :( Do yourself a favor and order something else!!!
customer_reviews.author: eshelton

customer_reviews.title: Beater Won't Stay In
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and didn't use it for a couple months. When I did it was too late to return but one beater will not stay in the hole. I have tried everything so am just throwing it away and ordering a different one. Just be sure to test beaters before using and the fact that they stay in the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: hmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I had a love-hate relationship with this... It worked beautifully at first... Easy to clean nice to look at... But I was making a poundcake and I was using this and it seemed like it strained so much for the poundcake that I thought I even smelled like the motor or something .. Very weird... Almost like it was ready to burn out... Haven’t used it since but planning on making a cake soon. Other than that it did a good job
customer_reviews.author: TerrtZ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but some hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a pretty good mixer for the price. That being said, there are a few things that could be better. It's a little heavy for a handheld mixer, especially with anything involving the words "stiff peaks." The storage case is nice, but sometimes it's challenging to get everything to fit back without it popping open. I do also wish that there was a slower speed available, the lowest is just a touch fast for some things. All in all, this is a pretty good value and my complaints aren't significant enough for me to try something different, but just things to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Smokes when making batter, heavy, case impossible, vent  hard to clean. Other than that perfect. LOL
customer_reviews.text: Smokes when mixing cookie batter. Storage case is useless unless you have a PhD in puzzles. Vent on bottom is very difficult to clean properly, heavy to hold when mixing. Also....Even on lowest speed, flour gets into fan mechanism and causes burning smell.
customer_reviews.author: Focus and Form Fitness

customer_reviews.title: It is OK for a simple uses
customer_reviews.text: My portable hand blender just broke not because it was an old and original as I've had it or 28 years but because I pushed it beyond what it can do. This is why I needed a replacement. This hand mixer is ok only because it vibrates too much when you use it and you can feel it in your hand. It will of course vibrate but the shaking is much more than I wanted. The old one I had did not do that. This Hamilton Beach is a cheap replacement and ok for the price.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this so I could make the whipped coffee that's been going around the internet lately. But I haven't made it yet. I also wanted this as a back and alternate to my stand mixer. This. is. AWESOME! I made some frosting for some cinnamon rolls, and even on the lowest setting it had an incredible amount of power. I love the storage container that comes with it. It's nice to have a space to put the extra pieces that come with it. I just wish it had a way to wrap the cord. That'd make it just slightly better. I love this little hand mixer though. It's amazing and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KaityDid

customer_reviews.title: Great Mixer, but...
customer_reviews.text: It was my mistake that I didn’t look at the mixer’s weight, but it is heavier than most hand mixers I ‘ve had: It is a powerful motor; and I wanted a hand mixer instead of a large mixer due to lack of space. The bottom plastic tub to place the parts don’t seem to hold to the mixer base very well. Maybe I am not affixing the 2 parts together: Because it works Good & powerful I gave it a 4, and I I didn’t pay attention to the weight. There is nothing wrong with the blender, but the weight with carpal tunnel & arthritis doesn’t help me, but I use it when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but lower price can be found elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. But I recommend other to buy the same item from Target or Walmart, will find cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: srahman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but challenging
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a cheap mixer and that’s what I got. It started smelling like burning metal the first time I used it. It’s scary to Use but I’m no quitter so I keep using the thing, just waiting for it to catch fire. Apparently it’s no quitter either because it’s playing chicken with me
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Decent mixer and good price.
customer_reviews.text: After many years mine finally bit the dust so I ordered this one. I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but I am hopeful. The first speed is actually slower than the others (after trying many out this isn't always the case) The only draw back is that is it HEAVY. I can't imagine mixing up several batches with it. So if you have shoulder or hand issues be aware. Luckily I don't bake too much and my daughter will be too happy to take over when I get tired.
customer_reviews.author: This Literary Life

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 6-Speed Electric Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this mixer to replace my old mixer was the advertised "slower first speed" feature. Well, it starts no slower than my old mixer, so making a mess when first starting out still happens. I do like the attachable storage case, and the included whisk attachment. So if you need a new mixer...this is a good one in my opinion. But if you are looking for a new mixer with a truly slow startup\first speed...this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cole

customer_reviews.title: does not include any dough hooks
customer_reviews.text: I never was able to test the mixer; the most important part for my baking are dough hooks.n Description on Amazon website stated dough hooks to be included. There were none in the package. Upon contacting Hamilton Beach directly I was told there were no dough hooks available for this model.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to get the beaters in this unit. It’s not powerful and didn’t last a few months. I don’t use it for heavy mixing either. If you want to replace it in a few months then buy it, otherwise don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Surprised with those negative reviews. One of my best purchased items ever. Easy to use,high quality for the price! A+++ for me.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick or small mixing needs!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs a handheld mixer for those times you don’t want, or need, to set up the stand mixer. This is a great alternative and the attachments store under the mixer and take up minimal shelf space.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Headley

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a machine
customer_reviews.text: It's great. Works wonderfully. Speeds; more than you will ever need. That little speed boost button is great and fun to use. That it has a case you can store the mixer blades and whisk in; amazing. Well made and works great and price is fantastic. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marius

customer_reviews.title: Motor started smoking with first use.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it twice, then gave up because of safety reasons. First use was blending sour cream for a dip. I used the turbo button to fluff it, but approx 2 seconds in the mixer smelled like it was burning and a small bit of smoke came from the vents. I immediately unplugged it, then decided to try again a few days later with cake mix. It immediately started smoking again on low speed. I didn't have a need to use it until just recently, so I can't even return it. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as shown in photo
customer_reviews.text: The main reason for purchasing the white model instead of the black one was that the white model show beaters, dough hooks, and a whisk attachment. The hand mixer that was sent is NOT the same as shown in the photo. The dough hooks were not included!! The only reason I purchased this model was because of the dough hooks. Very unhappy!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Potts

customer_reviews.title: Strictly bought this for dalgona coffee...
customer_reviews.text: During this pandemic you ran out of stuff to do and to try, so when we saw the dalgona coffee that is making its wave across social media, we had to try it. It said you can make it via normal hand whisk but i prefer the machine to do my bidding. It was easy to use and assemble. Our coffee turn out to be delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I love this hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 46-year-old Hamilton Beach hand mixer with this newer model. My old one is still working after 46 years, so how could I go wrong? Why did I change? I liked the bottom compartment to hold your attachments. Over the years there were times I'd have to search for the attachments. I've also owned countertop mixers and I preferred the small hand mixer.
customer_reviews.author: danbreck

customer_reviews.title: Portable Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mixer because the reviews were great. However, two issues that I've encountered are: (1) I find it difficult to insert the mixer blades. You have to insert them "just so" in order for them to remain in place without falling out; and (2) The low speed is not very low, which can cause whatever you're mixing to spurt out.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mac

customer_reviews.title: it caught fire
customer_reviews.text: This thing started to smoke and fire, why? do I have to fine a kohn's store to have it sent back, I took it out of the box to make some cookies and I started to smell rubber burning that's when it started to smoke I pull the plug out it time when it spark.
customer_reviews.author: strmdnce

customer_reviews.title: No Slow Speed!
customer_reviews.text: The mixer I have now IS a good one. HOWEVER, the slow speed is like a medium speed. The point being that this HamiltonBeach Mixer SAYS, on-line, that it has a Slow Speed. This is why I bought it. Well, it doesn't!!! It is slow for about 15 sec. and then jumps to the med speed. Otherwise this WOULD be a great mixer! But, again, the reason, the selling point, for me was a SLOW speed. Keep that butter and sugar IN the mixing bowl!!! The sauce I'm blending IN THE BOWL and NOT on the wall!! Wow. I wish mixer companies would GET this!! Oh well. On to Consumer reports! AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.author: Wonder

customer_reviews.title: It has been with me for three years
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to review this item since I purchased it in 2017. I dropped the mixer a few days ago and one of the beaters distorted, so I came back for customer service. The mixer has been with me for three years and it is still working (even though I drop it). It's a nice product so don't miss it! The only downside is that it doesn't look very refined and there is no eject button. So every time you need to remove and clean the accessories, you will definitely get your hands dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I don't have room for a stand mixer that comes with a bowl. I love that you can rest this one on the bowl and it doesn't fall over! I love the design and the snap-on storage- that is what sold me on this. I used to keep my old mixer and it's parts in a zip lock baggy and I hated storing it that way. This is so much neater and actually takes up less space. Great buy if you're limited on space.
customer_reviews.author: Sosy Markakis

customer_reviews.title: Great product except for the snap-on attachment holder
customer_reviews.text: Great product except for the snap-on attachment holder. It's a pain to get on and off and it's a tight fit for everything including the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fact that this hand mixer has a storage part for all the pieces but I dislike how heavy it is and when something is too thick it has a weird burning smell. Like last night when mixing fudge brownie mix it started smelling like burnt plastic and was struggling to mix!
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: Good mixer
customer_reviews.text: Its fairly light, the storage is a nice feature, though crowded by the cord, wish it had the same size attachments as it predecessor, I had been re-using the beaters from past mixers until now, these are narrowe3r and longer than earlier mixers. probably part of the ergonomic design change
customer_reviews.author: KPR

customer_reviews.title: mixer smoked and smelled like burning wire the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't buy again. There's no "low" speed, the storage case doesn't attach to the mixer, mixer smoked and smelled like burning wire the first time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish P.

customer_reviews.title: She loves how great it mixes and with the bottom acting as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Along with a toaster I also bought my mom this mixer . She is back to baking and cooking because this mixer is lite and with her arthritis and other physical problems she couldn’t do much cooking! She loves how great it mixes and with the bottom acting as a compartment she’s not always looking for the attachments . Thank You AMAZON with a great price and fast shipping it made my Mom happy so she can do what she does best COOK !
customer_reviews.author: Marilu

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, convenient
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, powerful hand mixer with convenient storage pack. I thought most hand mixers would be at least as powerful as the GE one I got in 1960 and used for 50 years. They're not, but this one is.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Forburger

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for Sunbeam stand mixer.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the two speeds. First speed adjustable by steps and then a button for a burst of speed which is really nice. A lot of folks have commented on beaters flicking batter out of the bowl... I'm still wearing an apron. Great Mixer!
customer_reviews.author: 2 Amazon Shoppers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hand Mixer
customer_reviews.text: I had a different Hamilton Beach hand mixer that lasted for many years and was disappointed when it finally stopped working. I was happy to see I could get something similar. It's a good little mixer.
customer_reviews.author: MK1959

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mixer many times, several times a week. Love it. I would recommend it for purchase or as a gift. Very easy to use, does not take much space, easy to clean and makes the kitchen experience, overall, much more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: moviebuff

customer_reviews.title: Convenient storage, user-friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love my mixer with snap-on bottom case. Perfect for storage of the attachments (I tend to lose the attachments easily), and I love that it came with a whisk as well. My young daughters were able to use it at low speed under my close supervision. The attachments are difficult to pull out, and the release button requires a lot more pressure than what I'm used to using. Otherwise, I my purchase is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's good at being OK.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to mix a batch of chocolate chip cookie dough, but just barely, and the mixer smelled of melted internals afterward. The thing still works, but it's certainly not made for thick mixing jobs, though it did do the cookies up better than I fared by hand. I'll stick to batters with this mixer for now
customer_reviews.author: Davidius

customer_reviews.title: Loved the case but kneed hooks are not included
customer_reviews.text: The photos show two kneed hooks with the other accessories. However, they are not included nor listed on the box. This was a "no sale" to me so exchanged it for another Hamilton Beach hand mixer that does include the kneed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift item !
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend’s mother desired a new mixer. This has been on her kitchen counter for awhile now & gets plenty of use. I hear lots of feedback re the many food preparations and how appreciative she is. Everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: William In N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Wish it lived up to other reviews
customer_reviews.text: After 3 times of use (mixing brownie batter) there was a smell coming from the front air vents. The low speed worked really well and the boost was a nice feature. After the 3rd use the beaters were difficult to pop out. The case was another selling point BUT they need to redesign it for easier power cord storage. I have reached out to the manufacturer and they offered a replacement option up to a certain dollar amount. Hopefully the new product does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on many different mixers. I read the reviews as well. This mixer is amazing. I had my mothers mixer, which I'm guessing was around 35 years old, so this was an amazing upgrade. I only gave it 4 stars for easy to hold because it is heavy. But I was willing to pay that price for the mixing capabilities. The power on this is the best. I make a lot of mints and this mixes through the mixture without any problems. It's a keeper!!!!
customer_reviews.author: busy_gal_98

customer_reviews.title: Hard to insert & remove beaters.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but very difficult to get the beaters in and out. I have some arthritis in my hands and I can only use it if my husband is home to help put them in and get them out.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first time I used it. The 2nd time I used it on cookie batter and smelled something like the motor was burning. I took it out this morning to use it and it wouldn't even start. That's $10 per use and it doesn't look like I can even return it. After talking to a customer rep, they agreed to replace it if I sent them a picture of the mixer with the cord cut, and if I paid the 11.69 for postage to send another one. Guess I have no choice but to take my chances again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Storage box could be better
customer_reviews.text: Mixer works great. The blades on the accessories are much thinner than my old one but seemed to work fine. I have a lot of trouble getting all the pieces and the cord back into the storage box.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crowell

customer_reviews.title: metal flaked off beaters
customer_reviews.text: I like the power of this mixer, but a few months after I started using it I ended up with silver flakes in my mashed potatoes from the beaters flaking off. Called Hamilton Beach and they would replace them for free but charged $5.99 shipping and it would take 7-10 days to receive them. I opted to order a new Krupps mixer with stainless steel blades and receive it in 2 days with prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: April Fischer

customer_reviews.title: da mixer
customer_reviews.text: needed a new mixer, this one is great, used same day I received it, well made, works super and look good too, matches all small appliances in my kitchen, should serve me for some time
customer_reviews.author: William Eynon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Strong motor. Storage case makes this mixer easy to put away with beaters and cord stashed inside. The first time I used it to make a cake and I found this mixer to be strong and easy to handle. Very sturdy design.
customer_reviews.author: MsMK

customer_reviews.title: It worked great as we made 4 cream cheese poundcakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this this for my new summerhouse. It worked great as we made 4 cream cheese poundcakes. The container to hold the cord is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: La_Aka_6

customer_reviews.title: No slow speed
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a few months and then gave it away and bought a better one. Slowest speed is way too fast. Impossible to blend in flour, etc., without having it initially fly out of the bowl due to the high speed on the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Craddock

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Mixes stuff. I've not had any problems with it. More importantly the woman likes it well enough. I've not tried the whisk that comes with it yet, but I assume it works just as well as the rest of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: PhelanKeller

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mixer. It fits great in my hand and is not too heavy. I love the little compartment that t comes with for the tools and cord to go into. It keeps everything together and separated into other drawers. Easy to store too in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sent me a USED blender twice!
customer_reviews.text: The blender seems to work at first plug in, but they sent me a used one the first time. Kind of gross! The second one was used too! So frustrating! With Christmas here, I have to keep the better of the two. However what a hassle to have to take it to Whole Foods for return. NOT WORTH the deal to buy a refurbished kitchen tool.
customer_reviews.author: Anne R.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to get the beaters out, and it is noisy. I have an old one that still runs, but is making some new noises so I thought I should have one on hand just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice mixer for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mixer after reading tons of reviews on many brands. So far it works exactly as it should. However, the storage container does not stay on! As soon as you attach it with your nice shiny clean beaters.... bam they're on the floor! That's my only complaint which is a disappointment since I was so excited about it. My daughter loves the fact that you can "hook" it on the bowl. I've not tried this myself.
customer_reviews.author: SMSLee

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST perfect
customer_reviews.text: This mixer works so very well! Amazing power. Chops right through everything. My ONLY complaint is that if you use the power boost, it smells like mixer is on fire!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for price
customer_reviews.text: The slow speed works great and all the rest of the speeds are very accommodating to what you are making. I like the container that holds the whisk, etc I also like the way it sits upright with the whisk over the bowl. Overall would recommend this mixer and I have had most of all the others and like this one the best! Don't hesitate,,, buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Smith

customer_reviews.title: Smokes when used on peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I bought to mix natural peanut butter, but it struggles and I can smell it smoking a bit. The motor is not very strong for thick substances. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: A very easy to use appliance. Like the pow start speed, others would start at a high speed and splash mixture around. Not this one. Carry case is easy to use and keeps every thing together. Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: I have looked all over for this mixer I had purchased one several years ago it wouldn't mind finally kicked out I was very upset search the stores all over and couldn't find one got on Amazon and found one and now I'm so happy and content thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: stephanie cuthbert

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a weak little hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item item because it just wasn't going to cut it for me. Seemed like a weak little hand mixer. I needed a stand up mixer for all the baking I do at home.
customer_reviews.author: Lissy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with lack of power
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it started to overheat with not so tough dough. It's good otherwise, but I think the main thing is that it mixes well and it didn't do well with soft cookie dough.
customer_reviews.author: Customer #1

customer_reviews.title: Newer version
customer_reviews.text: I bake a lot and my old mixer would not work on low speed and always made a mess on my counter. This newer model works great. It has several speeds, and is light weight. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Too Heavy Too fast
customer_reviews.text: MIxer was supposed to have a slow speed, but it was still as fast as the old mixer I was replacing. It was also twice as heavy. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. H. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. The one draw back is that it does not have an "eject" button for the mixing attachments. Other than that it does a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshiwara

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Bought
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure I needed to buy a hand mixer. I have a mix master. Kids took hand mixer to college but one day I decided to order one because I don't always want to use the large mixer and big bowl. This hand mixer is fantastic! It does a great job. Plenty of power, easy to use attachments, handy little self contained storage unit. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Just a little on the heavy side compared to the last one I owned. Storage for attachments with mixer is nice no more searching for them.
customer_reviews.author: 4theboyz

customer_reviews.title: This is a well working hand mixer at a good price. I had a relatively new Black & ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well working hand mixer at a good price. I had a relatively new Black & Decker with supposedly "professional style" beaters, but the beaters were thin and one of them broke. Finding beater replacement parts was impossible. I intentionally looked for traditional style beaters that are sturdy. So far, the Hamilton Beach mixer fits the bill. I like the way it rests on the bowl too.
customer_reviews.author: KCW

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this item
customer_reviews.text: Used this 3 times and it stopped working and smelled like electrical burning while mixing cookies. Thanks you pos device. Had my old mixer 20 years before it finally caved.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic beater
customer_reviews.text: Well, this works fine. My primary use is cram or egg whites. I like the whisk attachment and that all font in a case that the mixer snaps into. I cannot speak to durability as I have not had it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: JIW

customer_reviews.title: So far it’s good
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s good. Only used it on thick waffle batter so far but I like the little bin it sits in and holds the attachments. Power seems good too.
customer_reviews.author: stricken82

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Worked as well as expected and beyond. It has the power to perform, yet gentle enough to control well.
customer_reviews.author: RENAE

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Mixer is heavier than expected. I was hoping for a lighter mixer so hands don't get tired, but at least it has a way to sit or stand on the counter so it doesn't fall. I am used to light mixers for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Good hand mixer
customer_reviews.text: Mixer works fine. Comes with normal beaters and a single whisk. Also comes with a snap on case to hold the accessories. Clumsy and not easy to use. Unnecessary in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed.....
customer_reviews.text: that photo shows two dough hooks but they are not included with the product. A bit misleading to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Good power
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of my yellow hand mixer with this. Good weight. I didnt think i would use the storage for beaters, but it does keep them all together
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great blending power and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and great blender. Very easy to use and clean. It did the job when I used it to mash and blend cooked sweet potatoes. Very compact and takes up a very small amount t of space when stored.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Zecchini

customer_reviews.title: Beaters don't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a full 5 stars but have had issues with the beaters falling out while using it. The don't have a noticeable click when fully inserted which makes it hard to tell if they've completely caught inside.
customer_reviews.author: S Baker

customer_reviews.title: Shorted out on first use. Mixing Frosting!
customer_reviews.text: Sparked and smoked during the first time I used it. I was mixing a butter cream frosting for a cake. Seems like any mixer should be able to handle that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mix It Up
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and my friend has baked and baked since she received it. She loves the storage feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works well
customer_reviews.text: For those reviews that said the beaters fall out, just be sure to they are fully seated. I never had this problem
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work :(
customer_reviews.text: The item was clearly refurbished but did not work at all. I bought this to replace my existing hand mixer and was very disappointed to see that the item was a return. The numbers were work off on the side and it did not work at all when plugged in. Bummed I have to return it but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very large.
customer_reviews.text: this is huge and hard to manage. beaters hard to put in and eject. would return if packing was saved. Hate it. Going to donation pile.
customer_reviews.author: Porter's Master

customer_reviews.title: Good product but 4 stars for the cap- doesn't go ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product but 4 stars for the cap- doesn't go on well and the black base can be hard to clean if gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Thugnasty0628

customer_reviews.title: I had my last Hamilton Beach Mixer for over 30 years
customer_reviews.text: I trust Hamilton Beach products so I got this one. It's very cool. I look forward to making many things.
customer_reviews.author: Marikha

customer_reviews.title: GREAT design!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. The attached storage compartment to hold the accessories is truly a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: beachnut

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 6-Speed Electric Hand Mixer with Snap-On Case, Beaters, Whisk, Black (62692)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackPowerful Hamilton Beach hand mixers focus on ergonomics and versatility. Handles are built with a comfortable grip in mind. Convenient Snap-On storage cases keep attachments and cords together so you don't have to search for them Each time. A variety of attachments are available with different hand mixers, from traditional beaters to wire beaters, whisks, dough hooks and milkshake attachments. Hamilton Beach hand mixer handles are designed for control and comfort, and the unique Bowl rest feature allows the mixer to sit on the edge of the bowl to eliminate messy drips. A special quick burst button provides a quick boost of power and can be used for tough tasks at any speed.
feature_bullets: Mix with ease: with 6 speeds, including a slower first speed and quick burst button, you can adjust this kitchen mixer to accommodate any baking recipe.
Versatile attachments: The mixer includes easy to clean traditional beaters and Whisk.
Easy to handle: 275 watts of peak power to handle your baking needs.
Snap on storage case: This hand mixer includes a handy Snap on storage case with easy access door for convenient storage.
Bowl rest: a built in groove lets you rest The hand mixer over the bowl, so drips go where they belong and not all over your countertop.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,748 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
